participant_1.background:
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
I had to learn how to balance my time between my two jobs while also taking care of my family.
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
I'm a person who can enjoy the simple things in life and also be prepared for whatever comes my way.

participant_2.background:
I am indifferent to the weather.
i really like to go to school.
I now have more time to play music and tend to my garden.
I use my badge to intimidate people into giving me information.
i am not healthy.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well! Thanks for asking. How are you doing today?
I'm doing good! I just got back from lunch with my mom.
Oh, that sounds nice! Where did you go to lunch?
We went to our favorite restaurant, The Beatles Cafe.
I've never been there, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a great place to go for music lovers! They have a lot of Beatles memorabilia on display.
That sounds really cool! I love the Beatles.
Me too! They're my favorite band.
I'm glad to hear that. What's your favorite Beatles song?
It's hard to choose just one, but I think I'd have to say "Yesterday".
That's a good choice! It's a classic for a reason.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
